bio: Green, Blue + Kind is a Public Benefit Corporation with a mission to sell and develop creative, useful products that can keep our oceans blue, our planet green and promote kindness to all creatures. We offer branded items so that businesses can select products to communicate their identity and still carry out aligned missions. Our company works hard every day in all we do to change the dynamics of consumerism, analyzing everything from sourcing, transportation, and composition, selecting products and practices with ethical and environmental considerations.

We have chosen to be a Public Benefit Corporation because we care about so many more shades of green than the color of money. A portion of profits is set aside to fund animal, human and environmental improvement efforts. We don't just want to protect the environment and animals, we want to contribute to a future where the earth and animals do not need protecting.
